actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any person from raising as a defense to any proceeding commenced under the laws of the United States that such person was compelled by a foreign state to take the action which is the basis of the proceeding.

summary.text: Anti- Foreign Compulsion Act - Prohibits as a defense in any proceeding against any person for violation of any law of the United States a claim that such person was under compulsion by a foreign state to act, or fail to act, in violation of such law.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any person from raising as a defense to any proceeding commenced under the laws of the United States that such person was compelled by a foreign state to take the action which is the basis of the proceeding.
